```{r}
#6
month <- c("Jan","Feb","March","Apr","May","June")
price <- c(52.50,57.25,60.00,65.00,74.25,54.00)
liters <- c(25,30,40,50,10,45)

fuel_data <- data.frame(month, price, liters)
fuel_data

avg_exp <- weighted.mean(price, liters)
avg_exp
#Output : [1] 59.2625
#Description : The average fuel expenditure of Mr. Cruz from Jan to June is 59.2625
```
